Interface Board

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleBoard
public interface Board

  • Property Details

    • level

      javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty levelProperty
      Returns the level property for binding to UI. Level starts at 1 and increments every 10 cleared lines.
      See Also:
      • levelProperty()

  • Method Details

    • moveBrickDown

      boolean moveBrickDown()

    • moveBrickLeft

      boolean moveBrickLeft()

    • moveBrickRight

      boolean moveBrickRight()

    • rotateLeftBrick

      boolean rotateLeftBrick()

    • createNewBrick

      boolean createNewBrick()

    • getBoardMatrix

      int[][] getBoardMatrix()

    • getViewData

      ViewData getViewData()

    • mergeBrickToBackground

      void mergeBrickToBackground()

    • clearRows

      ClearRow clearRows()

    • getScore

      Score getScore()

    • newGame

      void newGame()

    • getNextBricks

      List<Brick> getNextBricks(int count)
      Gets the next N bricks that will appear. Used for displaying upcoming bricks in the UI.
      Parameters:
      count - the number of next bricks to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of the next N bricks

    • getGhostPieceY

      int getGhostPieceY()
      Calculates the Y position where the current brick will land (ghost piece position). Drops the brick down until it hits the bottom or another block.
      Returns:
      the Y coordinate where the brick will land, or the current Y if already at bottom

    • hardDrop

      int hardDrop()
      Instantly drops the current brick to the bottom (hard drop). Moves the brick down until it can no longer move, then returns true. The brick will be at its landing position after this call.
      Returns:
      the number of rows the brick was dropped (for scoring purposes)

    • levelProperty

      javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty levelProperty()
      Returns the level property for binding to UI. Level starts at 1 and increments every 10 cleared lines.
      Returns:
      the IntegerProperty representing the current level

    • setGameMode

      void setGameMode(GameMode mode)
      Sets the game mode (CLASSIC or ZEN).
      Parameters:
      mode - the game mode to set

    • getGameMode

      GameMode getGameMode()
      Gets the current game mode.
      Returns:
      the current game mode

    • addVineLine

      boolean addVineLine()
      Adds a vine line at the bottom and shifts the board up. Used in OVERGROWTH mode. Returns false if game over (top row has blocks).
      Returns:
      true if operation successful, false if game over

    • hasRemainingTreasure

      boolean hasRemainingTreasure()
      Checks if there are any remaining Gold blocks in the board. Used in Treasure Hunt mode to determine victory condition.
      Returns:
      true if any Gold blocks remain, false otherwise
